TopicTitle: Add XP to the Kerbals from a 0.25 savefile

Articles.Content: Well, what it says on the title. I have a 0.25 savegame with several established bases and ships on route and, since no kerbals have any xp, I can't even repair rover wheels. Is there a way, preferably automated, to add xp to the already existing kerbals?
Maybe there is something in the cheat menu, otherwise the only way I know of would be to manually edit your persistence file. (Can't check right now unfortunately).
